content: **2026 will be the year we crochet a meadow of flowers together flower seasons is this year s temperature blanket a project that grows day by day and eventually becomes something truly lovely to drape over your sofa or bed each flower represents a day and the color of the petals is determined by the temperature at 12 p m on that specific day a temperature blanket follows you through the entire year and flower seasons does so in a way that actually becomes more beautiful with each passing day welcome to this year s temperature blanket ** ***we are happy to be able to share our patterns with you for free unfortunately we are not able to answer dm s here on ravelry however we hope you will like the pattern and will enjoy seeing your project come to life *** **inspiration and free patterns** follow svarta fåret on instagram 1 **reseller map** svartafaret se 2 - brand website in swedish find a reseller 3 - nordic region in swedish **our official online stores** eddna se 4 eddna no 5 eddna de 6 eddna at 7 eddna nl 8 eddna be 9 1 https //www instagram com/svartafaretgarn/ 2 https //www svartafaret se/ 3 https //www svartafaret se/hitta-butik 4 https //www eddna se/ 5 https //www eddna no/ 6 https //www eddna de/ 7 https //www eddna at/ 8 https //www eddna nl/ 9 https //www eddna be/
